Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of Kaynes Technology on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}

This letter is prepared in duplicate and you are advised to return one copy duly signed to our office as a token of your accepting this offer letter and the terms and conditions mentioned herein.

Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to Kaynes Technology !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
Kaynes Technology
